results.content:
The course is very outdated; go to the Zurb Foundation and watch the tutorials there is much more useful. This actually increased the time I spend on it instead of making it a steeper learning curve. 

Also the basic setup is very very fast, if you have a basic knowledge of Node.js / Grunt / etc you'll struggle to keep up
results.content_html:

results.content: Overall, it's a very clean demonstration of Foundation that even basic developers could understand and begin implementing.  While some of the visuals do go a bit fast, it's very informative and has helped me gain a high-level understanding of the capabilities of foundation, how to implement it and begin using it in my projects.
results.content_html: Overall, it's a very clean demonstration of Foundation that even basic developers could understand and begin implementing. While some of the visuals do go a bit fast, it's very informative and has helped me gain a high-level understanding of the capabilities of foundation, how to implement it and begin using it in my projects.

results.content: Thanks for the course, loads of great information. Pay attention, was quick but covers a lot of content.
results.content_html: Thanks for the course, loads of great information. Pay attention, was quick but covers a lot of content.

results.content: The most important subjects for building websites with Zurb Foundation are handled in a very clear way. The only downside is that not all the source code can be downloaded (yet?). If that would be possible, then I would rate 5 stars.
results.content_html: The most important subjects for building websites with Zurb Foundation are handled in a very clear way. The only downside is that not all the source code can be downloaded (yet?). If that would be possible, then I would rate 5 stars.

results.content: It assumes a level of understanding of certain tools (such as git and others) and how they work.  Users unfamiliar with those tools, how they function, and without having those tools installed will be lost. In addition, you must know SASS (which adds utility and shortcuts to css).  If you don't know it, you will be lost.
results.content_html: It assumes a level of understanding of certain tools (such as git and others) and how they work. Users unfamiliar with those tools, how they function, and without having those tools installed will be lost. In addition, you must know SASS (which adds utility and shortcuts to css). If you don't know it, you will be lost.
